name: so it begins (WilleuJeans)
description: GLITCH [If the boss is casting too many abilities when you first respawn you should reboot the game, it's got got glitch where he goes insane] A game made for the 3 button game jam, I was inspired by only fighting the erdtrees in Elden Ring. I wanted the beautiful feeling of being so helplessly outmatched. In my rendition of combat you have no way to fight back. Simply survive. I made the game using unreal engine over the course of 10 days, everything in the game is modeled, animated, and coded by me. Its currently 5 am before the deadline so I'll be passing out soon. Enjoy rolling around! :)
